players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob's death is tragic. We need to share observations carefully. Who seems suspicious so far?"
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Charlie last night—he's innocent. Diana must be mafia trying to frame me."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. She is trying to frame me by lying about Charlie."
You: "Diana is clearly lying. If she were the detective, why would she investigate me first night instead of someone more suspicious? She's trying to frame the real detective."
Charlie: "Alice, if you're the detective, who did you investigate? Diana already said she investigated Alice. Your story doesn't add up."
